clinical_history: Routine obstetric ultrasound for fetal growth.
technique: High-resolution linear and curvilinear probes used for detailed evaluation.
findings: Uterus appears well-defined; endometrial thickness measures 29.63 mm.
Liver appears enlarged with no focal lesions.
Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 39.42 bpm.
Major vessels show hyperechoic waveform on Doppler.
impression: Appearance concerning for possible malignancy—correlate clinically.
